name: RandomNote
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' evernote.com; script-src 'unsafe-inline' https://sandbox.evernote.com *.evernote.com https://evernote-random.glitch.me *.glitch.me; style-src 'unsafe-inline' https://sandbox.evernote.com *.evernote.com https://evernote-random.glitch.me *.glitch.me; img-src 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'unsafe-inline'
